00025 // start the output buffer
00026 ob_start();
00027 $table = new simbio_table();
00028 $table->table_attr = 'align="center" class="detailTable" style="width: 100%;" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0"';
00029 $table->setHeader(array(__('Module Name'), __('Read'), __('Write')));
00030 $table->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00031 
00032 // initial row count
00033 $row = 1;
00034 $row_class = 'alterCell2';
00035 
00036 // database list
00037 $module_query = $dbs->query("SELECT * FROM mst_module AS m");
00038 while ($module_data = $module_query->fetch_assoc()) {
00039     // alternate the row color
00040     if ($row_class == 'alterCell2') {
00041         $row_class = 'alterCell';
00042     } else {
00043         $row_class = 'alterCell2';
00044     }
00045 
00046     $read_checked = '';
00047     $write_checked = '';
00048 
00049     if (isset($priv_data[$module_data['module_id']]['r']) AND $priv_data[$module_data['module_id']]['r'] == 1) {
00050         $read_checked = 'checked';
00051     }
00052 
00053     if (isset($priv_data[$module_data['module_id']]['w']) AND $priv_data[$module_data['module_id']]['w'] == 1) {
00054         $read_checked = 'checked';
00055         $write_checked = 'checked';
00056     }
00057 
00058     $chbox_read = '<input type="checkbox" name="read[]" value="'.$module_data['module_id'].'" '.$read_checked.' />';
00059     $chbox_write = '<input type="checkbox" name="write[]" value="'.$module_data['module_id'].'" '.$write_checked.' />';
00060 
00061     $table->appendTableRow(array(__( ucwords(str_replace('_', ' ', $module_data['module_name'])) ), $chbox_read, $chbox_write));
00062     $table->setCellAttr($row, 0, 'valign="top" class="'.$row_class.'" style="font-weight: bold;"');
00063     $table->setCellAttr($row, 1, 'valign="top" class="'.$row_class.'" style="width: 5%;"');
00064     $table->setCellAttr($row, 2, 'valign="top" class="'.$row_class.'" style="width: 5%;"');
00065 
00066     $row++;
00067 }
00068 
00069 echo $table->printTable();
00070 $priv_table = ob_get_clean();
00071 ?>
